segments.text: I hear many people here speak French .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is because Montreal is a bilingual city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is not easy to improve my English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's a good opportunity to learn French .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah ! But French is not easy to learn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . I have the confidence to learn it well .
segments.speaker: S2
